attributes.action: To Put Morocco on the Green list of countries and territories
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to put Morocco on the Green list because data show low rates of deaths and they are controlling their borders really well. Many people want to go to Morocco for a holiday because it’s a popular country and many people have already booked to go. As Morocco is controlling the COVID pandemic well, having to quarantine for 10 days is a lot and many people need to come back to work and school.
attributes.background: We would like the government to put Morocco on the Green list just like the other countries that were added on the 24th of June 2021.
